https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gLFqPjjqXQkHawF1HJnBYrhx3FQ.jpg It is the year 2052, on Earth, in Spain, and the final days of almost everything. The city is a string of abandoned construction sites. Everyday there are fewer people and not all of them are human. A sheep costs four and a half million pesetas and you have to spend a lot of bullets to pay for one. Androids Dream
